pages.text: The $(item)Levitator$() allows you to live your inner shulker dreams.$(br2)When given a redstone signal, it'll make any entities in the direction its facing fly! (or just be pushed if the block is horizontal, but that's not as cool)

pages.title: Disclaimer
pages.text: The $(item)Levitator$() is a reskinned version of the $(item)Fan$() from the $(thing)Trap Expansion$() mod. It was reskinned and renamed for purposes of the modpack$(br2)If you were to download the mod yourself, you'll get a $(item)Fan$() block, which does the exact same thing.
